description:
Everything you love, now at your fingertips!

SHEIN is an affordable online shopping platform offering rich items and trendy goods. Discovering pretty items, trying new things and sharing with others,  SHEIN is dedicated to meet all your needs in life and works as your one-stop shopping destination! We take pride in satisfying our customers and bringing them the best shopping experience.

Inspire yourself with SHEIN right now!

Save you more
- Register and get £3 includes sale
- Free limited-time delivery and free returns within 30 Days（*conditions apply）
- Daily flash sales on many items 

Wide selections
- Fun, easy shopping with wide selections
- Browse by New Arrivals, Trends, Category, Best Sellers and more

Considerate services
- Get first access to sale alerts and promotional discounts
- Now accepting PayPal and major Credit Cards 
- Style now, pay later! Choose Afterpay to pay in 4 interest-free payments.
- 24/7 Customer Service and Live Chat available

Contact us:
Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/SHEINOFFICIAL/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/sheinofficial/
Email: dispute@shein.com


The app needs the following access permissions when it is running on your device:

-	Optional permission(s):

o	Notification: it will allow us to send push notifications to your device.

o	Camera: the camera function is required when you need to capture photos and videos and upload them to the app.

o	Photo and video: it will enable you to upload photos and videos from your device to the app.

o	Location: where the relevant service is available, it enables location based services on your device. 
(This is not used in Korea.)

o	Calendar: it enables you to sync the SHEIN LIVE events to your device calendar. 

o	Microphone: when you try to capture videos using Camera function, the app will also need the microphone access permission to capture the voice. 

※ Even if you do not grant optional access permissions, you can still use SHEIN service, except for the functions related to those permissions.

Black Friday starts here — score huge deals on the AliExpress app right now. AliExpress brings millions of items across fashion, electronics, home, beauty and more, all in one easy app so you can grab Black Friday discounts, flash sales and app-only coupons.

Find top brands, unique finds and everyday essentials at great prices. Read honest buyer reviews, compare sellers, and use smart search and filters to find exactly what you want. With AliExpress you get personalized recommendations, saved wishlists, price-drop alerts and curated collections tailored to your tastes.

We make shopping safe and simple. AliExpress protects your purchase with secure payments, buyer protection and easy returns. Track orders in real time, get delivery updates, and choose fast shipping options when you need items quickly. Chat with sellers or our support team right from the app.

Don’t miss limited-time Black Friday deals, exclusive app offers and flash events — AliExpress updates promotions constantly so you can save more. Whether you’re hunting for gifts, seasonal styles, or must-have gadgets, AliExpress puts endless choice and value in your pocket.

Download the AliExpress app today, join millions of shoppers, and enjoy worry-free shopping during Black Friday and all year round. Great finds and huge savings are just a tap away on AliExpress.

developer: Hangzhou Alibaba International Information Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
What is Alibaba.com?
Alibaba.com is one of the world’s leading B2B ecommerce marketplaces. Our app allows you to source products from global suppliers, all from the convenience of your mobile device.

Purchase with confidence
Our Trade Assurance service protects your orders and payments on the platform, letting you purchase securely and conveniently with extended support.

Customizable products
Meet suppliers with years of customization and order fulfillment experience for sellers on Amazon, eBay, Wish, Etsy, Mercari, Lazada, and more.

Easy sourcing
Discover millions of ready-to-ship products in every industry category. Tell suppliers what you need and get quotes quickly with Request for Quotation services.

Fast shipping
Alibaba.com partners with major freight forwarders to provide land, sea, and air shipping solutions with on-time delivery services, end-to-end tracking, and competitive prices.

Livestreams and factory tours
Interact with manufacturers in real-time via product demos and tours of manufacturing facilities, providing insight and oversight on how your products are made.

Popular categories and trade shows
Source a wide range of popular items – from trending consumer goods to raw materials – and join our annual trade shows for niche product highlights and discounts.

Quality control
Choose Alibaba.com Production Monitoring and Inspection Services to reduce production delay and quality risks.

Discounts and promotions
Unlock new discounts and promotions from featured manufacturers and suppliers.

Stay updated
Use the Alibaba.com app to stay up to date on new products and promotions from your favorite suppliers.

Language and currency support
Alibaba.com supports 16 languages and 140 local currencies. Use our real-time translator to communicate with sellers in your mother tongue.

Buy and sell new and preloved designer fashion at up to 70% off with Vestiaire Collective. Join our global fashion activist community of +10M members and discover more than 3M carefully curated bags, clothing, sneakers, shoes, watches, and more. Shopping for fashion sustainably has never been easier.

Every week, we add designer items from brands like Gucci, Prada Louis Vuitton, Burberry and Dior

Designer fashion marketplace - buy and sell with Vestiaire Collective, and get:

• Access to thousands of unique new and preloved bags, clothing and designer items.
• Quality control for designer pieces from brands like Gucci, Prada, Louis Vuitton and more.
• Bags, clothing, shoes, sneakers, and more: use search tools to find exactly what you're looking for.
• Personalized notification for designer fashion items you're looking for.
• A convenient marketplace for selling designer clothing and shoes you no longer wear.
• An easy payment process.


Join the designer fashion revolution now and discover discover new and preloved items sold by your community - or sell your own designer bags, clothing, shoes, or even sneakers, straight from your phone.


From Prada to Gucci, Fendi to Burberry, we have an unrivaled selection of vintage and designer clothing for your sustainable fashion shopping.

BUY DESIGNER PIECES - HOW DOES IT WORK?

1. Find that must-have item - we add over 3,000 pieces to our marketplace every week.
2. Your item will then be sent to us by the seller and quality-checked by our experts.
3. Once the item has passed Quality Control, it will be shipped to you!


SELL PRELOVED DESIGNER ITEMS - HOW DOES IT WORK?

1. Submit an item (for example, designer clothing, sneakers, accessories) for sale using our simple online seller form.
2. Once your item has sold, you will receive a pre-paid shipping label to send the item to our HQ free of charge.
3. Sold! Once your item passes Quality Control, you will receive payment directly into your bank account.

JOIN THE FASHION ACTIVIST COMMUNITY

We're driving positive change in the fashion world - by revolutionizing the way we shop designer items. Our sustainable marketplace empowers fashion-lovers to buy and sell fashion and share their style. Join now and become a fashion activist!

With the Vestiaire Collective app, you can:

· Keep in touch with the Vestiaire Collective fashion community.
· Make offers to sellers and negotiate the price of an item.
· Add items to your wishlist and share the products you're currently coveting.
· Follow members whose products and style you like.
· Buy and sell designer items in a fashion-loving community.
· Support a sustainable way of shopping designer items.

Whether you're after a Louis Vuitton bag or want to sell your Gucci dress, download the Vestiaire Collective app now to get started. Looking for something special? 

We've got vintage pieces that you won't find anywhere else - discover stunning Rolex watches, vintage Hermès handbags and so much more.

Follow us for behind the scenes action, events, and preview top products before they go online @vestiaireco on Instagram.

Comprehensive

Quickly search, get product details, read reviews and purchase millions of products available from Amazon and other merchants.

Convenient
Sign in with your existing Amazon account to access your basket, payment and shipping options. No need to create a new account to manage your 1-Click settings and wish lists, track your orders and use your Prime membership benefits. Shop just as you do on the web.

Fast
Compare prices and check availability instantly by scanning a barcode, snapping a picture or typing your search. 

Secure
All purchases are routed through Amazon's secure servers.

Universal
Shop Amazon.co.uk, Amazon.de, Amazon.es, Amazon.fr, Amazon.com, Amazon.it, Amazon.cn or Amazon.co.jp, Amazon.sg from a single app.

For customers located within the European Union, United Kingdom or Brazil: By using this app, you agree to Amazon’s Conditions of Use applicable for your country. Please also see the applicable Privacy Notice, Cookies Notice and Interest-Based Ads Notice for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.
 
For all other customers: By using this app, you agree to the applicable Amazon Conditions of Use (e.g. www.amazon.com/conditionsofuse) and Privacy Notice (e.g. www.amazon.com/privacy) for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.

Shop App's first ever Free Delivery Festival is here!
Shop from over millions of products at the best prices possible, and get your items delivered for FREE.

If you face any technical issues, please drop us a line at customer@shop.com.mm

Discover trendy outfits, dresses, jeans and affordable clothing with fast shipping and 1000+ new arrivals weekly. Our online shopping app brings stylish women's, curve, men's and kids’ fashion to your fingertips as the #1 most-searched fashion brand.

-----
WHY FASHION NOVA IS YOUR STYLE ESSENTIAL
-----

• 1000+ NEW ARRIVALS WEEKLY: Be the first to rock the latest trends and new clothes before anyone else. Our design team brings you trendy outfits inspired by runway looks.
• INCLUSIVE SIZING: Perfect fits for every body type with our Women's, Plus Size, Curve, Men's, and Kids collections. Our trendy clothing is designed to flatter all bodies.
• CELEBRITY-APPROVED STYLES: Worn and loved by today's biggest stars. Our trendy outfits have been featured in music videos, red carpet events, and social media posts.
• UNBEATABLE PRICES: Runway-inspired fashion at discount prices that won't break the bank. We deliver boutique-quality clothing at affordable prices.
• LIGHTNING-FAST SHIPPING: Get your must-have pieces delivered quickly to your door. Shop new clothes and have them arrive in time for the weekend.
• EASY RETURNS: Hassle-free 30-day return process to ensure your complete satisfaction with every purchase of our stylish clothes.

-----
APP FEATURES THAT ELEVATE YOUR ONLINE SHOPPING
-----

• PERSONALIZED RECOMMENDATIONS: Discover stylish clothes curated just for you based on your browsing history and preferences.
• EASY CHECKOUT: Save your details for one-tap purchasing, making buying trendy clothing faster than ever.
• EXCLUSIVE APP-ONLY DEALS: Access special discounts and flash sales first, before they're available anywhere else.
• WISH LIST: Save your favorites to shop later. Keep track of those must-have trendy pieces you want.
• ORDER TRACKING: Monitor your package from warehouse to doorstep with real-time updates on your trendy outfits.
• REAL-TIME NOTIFICATIONS: Get instant alerts on new arrivals, restocks, and exclusive flash sales.
• SECURE PAYMENT OPTIONS: Shop with confidence using multiple payment methods including installment plans.

-----
DISCOVER OUR TRENDING COLLECTIONS
-----

• FASHION NOVA: Contemporary women's styles from casual to boutique quality. From basics to statement pieces, our women's collection offers trendy outfits for every occasion.
• FASHION NOVA CURVE: Stunning plus-size fashion that celebrates every curve with stylish options. Our plus size collection features trendy clothing cut to fit.
• FASHION NOVA MEN: Streetwear and casual essentials for the modern man who appreciates quality and style. Our men's collection offers trendy outfits for day to night.
• FASHION NOVA KIDS: Miniature versions of our hottest adult styles for fashion-forward young ones.

-----
FIND YOUR PERFECT STYLE
-----

• Our app makes finding your perfect look effortless. Whether you're searching for that sexy statement piece, curve-hugging jeans, or casual streetwear, we've got you covered.
• The Fashion Nova shopping experience is designed with you in mind. Our intuitive search filters help you find the perfect trendy outfits by size, color, price, or occasion.
• Join our global community of Fashion Nova Babes! Tag @FashionNova, @FashionNovaCURVE, and #NovaBabe for a chance to be featured on our social platforms.
• Gentlemen, elevate your wardrobe with Fashion Nova Men! Tag @FashionNovaMEN and #NovaMen to showcase your streetwear style.

CONNECT WITH US:

• Instagram: @FashionNova, @FashionNovaCURVE, @FashionNovaMEN
• TikTok: @FashionNova
• X: @FashionNova
• Facebook: @FashionNova
• Snapchat: @FashionNova

Download the Fashion Nova app now and experience why we're the fastest-growing online boutique worldwide. Shop our trendy clothing collection today—your next head-turning outfit is just a tap away!

FLEXIBLE WAYS TO PAY
Choose to pay in 3 interest-free instalments, pay the full amount, in 30 days or with financing.¹

¹ UK: Klarna’s Pay in 3/Pay in 30 days are unregulated credit agreements. Klarna Financing is regulated if it charges interest or lasts over 12 months. It is not regulated if it’s 0% interest and 12 months or less. Borrowing more than you can afford or paying late may negatively impact your financial status and ability to obtain credit. 18+, UK residents only. Klarna’s Regulated Financing has a representative APR of 21.9% (fixed).

¹ Ireland: Please shop responsibly. 18+ ROI residents only. Credit subject to status. APR 0%. Missed payments may incur a fee and affect your ability to use Klarna in the future. T&Cs apply. https://www.klarna.com/ie/terms-and-conditions/. 

SHOP ANYWHERE IN THE KLARNA APP
Access Klarna's flexible payment options anywhere - shop at your favorite stores and split your purchase with the payment plan that suits you.

UP TO 10% CASHBACK
Shop in the app and earn up to 10% cashback. Get cashback at hundreds of stores in the app.²

² Klarna Cashback Rewards are awarded as points which can be redeemed for a credit to your Klarna Balance and other benefits. Earn cashback on Klarna App purchases. Klarna balance account required. Cashback issuance depends on store approval and may be affected by cookie settings, combining offers, product exclusions, or other factors beyond our control. Klarna may get a commission. Limitations, terms and conditions apply.

SHOP WITH THE KLARNA CARD
Pay with Klarna anywhere Visa is accepted. Pay now or pay later with the card. No fees and no credit impact to apply.³ 

³ UK & Ireland: A paid Klarna Membership is required for a physical card. Klarna Membership offered for a monthly fee. Cancel any time in the Klarna app. Exclusions, conditions, and limitations apply to membership benefits like Klarna Membership cashback. Klarna Membership Terms apply.

UNLOCK YOUR KLARNA BALANCE
Add money to your balance and pay flexibly, anywhere you shop. Get instant refunds, earn cashback at eligible stores, and convert your cashback as a credit in your balance.⁴

⁴ Ireland: Account covered by the Swedish deposit guarantee scheme. Max. compensation per customer: SEK 1,050,000. National Debt Office makes compensation available within 7 business days from the date a right to compensation accrues. Read more here.

USE KLARNA WITH APPLE PAY
Split the cost with Klarna on Apple Pay, available in-store and online.

FIND THE BEST PRICE, EVERY TIME
Search for any product and instantly compare prices across stores.

HASSLE-FREE RETURNS
Need to send something back? Report a return right in the app. We’ll pause your purchase so you don’t have to pay in the meantime.

TRACK ALL YOUR DELIVERIES
Get real-time updates, arrival times, and pickup photos—right in the Klarna app.

24/7 CUSTOMER SERVICE
Use our chat in the Klarna app for 24/7 support.

The Made-in-China.com App is a world leading wholesale mobile B2B marketplace for global trade. Buy products from quality Chinese suppliers all from your mobile device conveniently. 

3 STEPS to complete your transaction:
Search Products > Place Orders > Trade Safely

Shop What You Need
We provide safe and reliable online trading services. All transaction processes can be completed in our app. You can place an order and track your order anytime, anywhere.

Easy Sourcing
Source millions of new and innovative products from Verified Suppliers. 40,000,000 products from 27 categories are all for your purchase requirements. Now you can easily select and compare products.

Get Multiple Quotations
Post customized sourcing requests, you will receive price quotes in 24 hours. 
6,000,000 suppliers gathered here are trade agents, wholesalers, retailers, manufacturers and SMEs, fulfilling the demands from sellers on Amazon, eBay, wish, etsy, mercari, lazada and so on.

Keep in Touch
Send inquiries to get latest factory discounts or sample requests. Chat directly with suppliers by TradeMessenger system. You can make a voice call or video call to verify the supplier.  

Brand New Smart Expo
Hold various online exhibitions that simultaneous with major trade fairs from all over the world. No matter where you are, you can efficiently browse the virtual booths and start face-to-face online meetings with exhibitors at once.

Member Events
Organize diverse forms of member events on a regular basis. Semi-monthly live video streaming, celebration activities during festivals, events that open to everyone...... All is waiting for you!

Languages & Currencies Supported
The Made-in-China.com supports 16 popular languages: English, Spanish, Portuguese, French, Russian, Italian, German, Dutch, Arabic, Korean, Japanese, Hindi, Thai, Turkish, Vietnamese, Indonesian. And 18 local currencies are now available.

Moreover
Get most relevant recommendations based on your sourcing preferences.
Share products and suppliers on Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, etc.
“Featured” channel helps you find trustworthy suppliers and high-quality products.

The Made-in-China.com App, a must-have app in global B2B trade!
DOWNLOAD NOW AND GROW YOUR BUSINESS!

description:
ACBUY: Your Direct Gateway to Shop Taobao Globally
Discover affordable, authentic cross-border shopping powered by direct Taobao integration.      Tap your screen to explore Taobao products  – all with local-language support and risk-free guarantees.
We partner with trusted suppliers worldwide to ensure authenticity and unbeatable prices.   With convenient logistics and dedicated customer support, ACBUY makes cross-border shopping worry-free.
Download ACBUY now and embark on your global shopping journey to discover endless surprises!

【About SUGARGOO】
SUGARGOO is a one-stop China product guide and international shipping platform, providing global users with free purchasing, inspection, and storage services. Meanwhile, we offer over 1,000 international logistics routes with different timeframes and prices, making it truly fast, efficient, and cost-effective for users to experience the charm of ""Made in China"" up close!

【Convenient Online Shopping】
SUGARGOO APP offers rich features and services, including product search, personalized recommendations, real-time synchronization of product information, professional purchasing services, and shipping cost estimation, all dedicated to providing you with a more convenient and comfortable shopping experience! We support purchasing from various Chinese e-commerce platforms such as Taobao, Tmall, JD, Weidian, 1688, Xianyu, and Yupoo, etc.

【Global Shipping】
SUGARGOO provides multiple international shipping routes to meet your shipping needs. Our logistics services cover multiple countries and regions, including the United States, the United Kingdom, Canada, Australia, France, and the European Union, etc. We ensure that your shipping is safe, cost-effective, and convenient!

【Member Benefits】
Register as a SUGARGOO member and receive an 800 yuan new user shipping gift package. You will have the opportunity to participate in regular activities and receive exquisite gifts, points exchange coupons, and free parcel services.

【Customer Service】
SUGARGOO has a professional purchasing team, customer service team, warehousing team, and international logistics team to provide you with a one-stop, full-process service, Your persistence is worth!

From China to global
Website: SUGARGOO.COM
Email: cs@sugargoo.com

Motion. Movement. Always Forever Forward. Christmas is gonna be a big one. You with us? We’re kicking off this Festive season right. With the biggest brands, and all the latest drops. Right here on the JD app.

All things JD, all in one place. Download the app. Track your orders. Play JD Festive Jump. And be the first to know about app-exclusive offers and when the Black Friday and Christmas Sales land. Notifications: on.

Big brands
Nike. adidas. The North Face. New Balance. And so many more. We’re shoutin the biggest brands this season. Every motive, every style. Lowkey chills, stepping out, gym sessions. We’ve got you covered with clothing, trainers and accessories from your faves.

Premium picks from EA7 Emporio Armani and Calvin Klein? Sorted. JD exclusives like McKenzie or Unlike Humans? Got em. See all these and loads more.

Crep check
Fresh on foot. Always. From the latest launches to essential picks, your rotation’s gonna be popping off. Air Max 95 to Air Force 1. Samba to Climacool. If it’s creps you’re copping, you already know we’re the one.
With colder days coming, we’re going big on boots. Timberland to Dr Martens, bag a fresh pair of boots for autumn. Keeping it chilled when the weather hits? Don’t blame you. We’ve got kicks for kicking back in from Crocs, UGG, and loads more.

Big coat weather
Feeling the chill? Shop stacks of new layers. Get heavy-duty hitters with padded coats from The North Face, Berhgaus and Columbia. 
Looking for something lighter? Montirex, Trailberg and Napapijri deliver on jackets. Stay dry. Feel fresh. 

Christmas Giftin'
Your next gifting haul’s gonna be stacked with new season style. T-shirts to tracksuits. Hoodies and joggers. Men’s, women’s, and kids’. Our clothing collection’s packed with essential fits. 

Sportswear
Got goals? We’re gonna help you get there. Gym class. Run club. Weight session. Wherever you’re moving, we’re moving with you. Cop workout essentials from champion names like On, HOKA, Under Armour and more. 

And when you’re hitting that pitch, we’ve got replica kits from the biggest clubs to get you prepped for matchdays. Pick up the pace with football boots from Nike, adidas and PUMA. As well as all the training gear you need to match that pro energy.

JD STATUS
The ultimate loyalty app. Become a JD STATUS member and earn rewards with every shop. And it’s free. Get 10% JD Cash on your first JD STATUS cop, and earn 1x JD Cash every time. 

We’re talking member-exclusive deals, boosted JD Cash, and competitions you don’t wanna miss. Trust.

Pay your way
Secured the bag? Now choose how you pay. Apple Pay, Google Pay and PayPal make it mega easy. Or Klarna, Clearpay and Laybuy take the stress away. 

Make it yours
Signature style. Made just for you. Customise your cop with personalised designs. Caps, bags, football shirts and football boots. Make it your own with personalisation in the app.

Are you always searching for the latest trends? Do you love discovering new outfits? 
Do you always go for looks that are a hit wherever you go? Then this is the place for you! 

Download the Bershka app now and discover a new way of buying clothes and fashion online, view fashion items on a daily basis, see the latest trends for him and for her, manage your account and find the nearest stores.


THE COMPLETE BERSHKA CATALOGUE IS WITHIN REACH 


With the Bershka app, you will get access to the online store and can buy clothes in the most comfortable way, get the latest news, the latest fashion trends and items, women’s clothing (dresses, coats, shirts, skirts, blouses, boots…) men’s clothing (trousers, shirts, jackets, t-shirts, shoes…) and accessories (bags, purses, jewellery, belts…) as well as beauty and make-up. 

CREATE A WISH LIST WITH ALL THE ITEMS YOU LOVE 

You can do more than just buy clothes. You can also look at the complete catalogue, select the items that you like the most, choose complete outfits, and make a list of the latest trends for your next shopping trip - choose what you love best! 

MANAGE YOUR ACCOUNT 

With the app, you can do more than just buy clothes. 
You can also manage your orders, keep track of your online purchases, contact the customer service team if you have any questions and recommend the app to your friends. 

DISCOVER THE STORES CLOSEST TO YOU 

Thanks to geolocation, the app can tell you where the nearest store is and whether the store sells womenswear, menswear or both, and also provides you with a contact number for the store in case you want to order a specific item. You can also save your favourite items to a list and access them immediately if necessary.


EVERYTHING YOU CAN DO WITH THE BERSHKA APP

√ Discover the latest fashion trends
With the app, you can quickly see which clothes will be in fashion each season.
√ Buy all the catalogue items 
Choose the clothes you love and buy them! You only have to choose your payment method, enter the delivery address and wait for your order to arrive as quickly as possible.
√ Create a wish list with the items you love the most 
You can find out which clothes and accessories are on-trend and you can also save the items you like the most to a wish list. You can add items for women and men in the app with a QR code or with a scanner. 
√ Manage your account 
Via your user account, you can review your purchases, track your orders and contact the customer service department with any questions you may have.
√Find new places to shop
The app shows you a list of the nearest stores. You can also see their location on the map and add them to your favourites list or view their details (contact phone number, if they sell womenswear, menswear or both, and the exact address)


Do you like to dress in the latest fashion? Do you like to buy clothes, shoes and accessories for women and men directly from your mobile? Do you want to see all the orders you have placed? Do you want to discover new stores? In that case, the Bershka app is exactly what you have been looking for. 

It’s much more than an online store.

In addition to our permanent collections, with our Zara App you can find all our special launches, our beauty category and our lingerie line. 

Other utilities of the Zara App are:

Store mode 
-	Use your application in ""store mode"" when you are shopping in any of our stores and use all its features to improve your experience. 


Zara QR:
Use your QR on the Zara App for: 
-	Having associated all of your purchases online and at physical stores. At a physical store, identify yourself at the till with your Zara QR code and request an e-receipt.
-	In-store returns for both online and in-store purchases.
-	Collect all of your online orders at a physical store.

With global delivery support, enjoy hassle-free shipping worldwide. Experience our unique free high-definition video quality check, allowing you to inspect products before purchase. Seamlessly manage orders with our user-friendly interface, ensuring a smooth and efficient process. Say goodbye to message overload – we provide live shipping data, keeping you informed in real-time. Plan your budget effectively by viewing product weights upfront, allowing for accurate cost estimates before placing orders. Cnfans revolutionizes international shopping with simplicity and transparency. Embrace a future of effortless global commerce – download Cnfans now!

- Kids' clothes and accessories for boys and girls of all ages.
- Beauty and cosmetics products including makeup for face, eyes, lips, as well as make up bags, perfumes, and more.
- H&M Home products including living room, bedroom, kitchen, bathroom & kids' room decorations & accessories, furniture, glassware, kitchenware, blankets, rugs, bed linen, and more.
-Explore sportswear you can rely on, whatever the move. By H&M Move.Go for new sportswear to step up the game. Feel good. Look awesome.Your perfect sport tights are your trusty and stylish companions, whether you're sweating in the gym or binge streaming on the couch
Activate push notifications for the app to stay updated with the newest clothes collections and our exclusive online offers, promotions, and discounts. Enjoy a smooth and fun online fashion shopping experience with the app's features including the ability to track your orders step by step from buying them online till their delivery and saving the items you want to have to your wish list to purchase later.

Don't miss out on our best clothes collections and online shopping offers and download the H&M app now. When you download the H&M app, we will process your data in accordance with our privacy notice. For more details on this, please visit https://kw.hm.com/en/privacy-policy/

With the Pull&Bear app you get full access to the store, where you can shop for clothes online and discover the latest new arrivals and trends for the autumn-winter season for her (jackets, denim, biker jackets, jumpers, blouses, jeans, boots...) and for him (hoodies, oversize T-shirts, trousers, coats, cardigans, trainers...), and accessories for both (bags, scarves, hats, hair clips or wallets).

Enjoy quick and direct access to all Pull&Bear collections at any time and pick your favourites from the comfort of your home. Download it and create more outfit ideas than you could ever imagine, for any occasion!

- PBShuffle – An innovative shopping experience in video format. 

- Wishlist - You can create a wish list and save the products you like most. Don’t let your favourites get away! 

- Geolocation - Find the Pull&Bear store nearest you, as well as other collection points. You can also see their locations on the map. 

-Customisation – Product recommendations to suit your tastes. 

- Fashion trends - Get inspired by the new products that arrive each week, as well as our editorials. 

Dive into an unmatched shopping experience, giving you full access to our online store where you can indulge in the latest fashion and explore the most vanguard trends of the season. 

For her, hoodies, stylish party dresses, shoes and fashion trainers that will let you step out in style, or blazers and waistcoats with trendy prints, like animal print or geometric shapes. Don't forget to explore our selection of jeans tailored to your unique style.

For him, denim jackets with a vintage touch, trousers and jeans that blend comfort and style, knit sweaters that express personality and jackets, hoodies and trainers that stand out on any occasion.

In addition to the coolest fashion, the Pull&Bear app also invites you to explore a wide range of accessories for both genders. Find bags that complement your style, hats that add a touch of elegance, scarves and gloves to keep out the cold, jewellery, backpacks that are both practical and stylish and phone cases that reflect your personality. With our quick and direct access, you can explore all Pull&Bear collections at any time and select your favourite garments in just a few clicks, all from the comfort of your home. Don’t miss the opportunity to download our app and unleash your creativity by designing an endless variety of outfits for every occasion. Pull&Bear accompanies you at every step of your fashion journey, ensuring you’re always at the forefront of trends and ready to stand out with your unique style. Download the app now and discover a world of fashion at your fingertips!

A App do Pingo Doce evoluiu!


Para criar uma experiência mais próxima dos seus gostos e necessidades, criámos O Meu Pingo Doce, onde lhe oferecemos vantagens e benefícios exclusivos. Na App, vai poder ver os descontos dos produtos da sua loja, gerir os benefícios e cupões exclusivos, aderir aos Clubes Pingo Doce e aderir ou registar o cartão poupa mais com apenas alguns cliques.



Clubes Pingo Doce


Adira ao Clube do Bebé e ao Clube do Vinho e tenha acesso a preços, promoções, dicas e eventos exclusivos que o Meu Pingo Doce preparou para si. 



Benefícios exclusivos


Consulte e utilize todos os seus benefícios e cupões exclusivos. Agora é ainda mais fácil gerir e usufruir de todos os seus benefícios com a App O Meu Pingo Doce. 




Tenha os folhetos da sua loja sempre à mão


Com a App O Meu nova aplicação Pingo Doce, já pode ter acesso facilitado aos folhetos da semana da sua loja preferida. Em Portugal Continental, na Madeira ou nos Açores.
Mantenha-se a par das promoções mais recentes e comece a poupar de forma ainda mais fácil!





Cartão Poupa Mais


Aderir ao Cartão Poupa Mais ficou mais simples e pode ser feito na App O Meu Pingo Doce, em apenas alguns cliques e beneficiar de vantagens exclusivas. Leve-o consigo para todo o lado. É tão fácil poupar mais.




Oportunidades para si


Esteja atento às recomendações personalizadas que temos para si e não deixe escapar nenhuma promoção, dos seus produtos preferidos. 




Faça listas de compras partilhadas e compre online


Faça a sua lista de compras na App, selecionando todos os produtos de que necessita. Pode pesquisar por texto ou por voz, adicionar a partir de sugestões exclusivas ou diretamente das promoções e dos folhetos, ou até fazer o scan do código de barras quando estiver em loja. Partilhe a lista com os restantes membros do seu agregado familiar, para que nunca se esqueça de nada. Com a lista pronta, a escolha é sua: visite o Pingo Doce mais próximo ou compre online e tenha as suas compras entregues em casa ou prontas para levantamento na loja.




Encontre todos os produtos da sua loja


Procure, visualize e selecione todos os produtos existentes em loja de forma rápida e cómoda. Pode filtrar e ordenar por preço ou categoria, para encontrar exatamente o que procura. Os melhores frescos estão aqui. Desde a carne mais tenra, ao peixe mais fresco e à fruta e legumes acabados de colher. Conheça os produtos da Marca Própria que os Portugueses preferem, 30 anos de história recheada de momentos deliciosos, com centenas de produtos que nos enchem de orgulho, com certificação de desenvolvimento e com o nosso compromisso de qualidade.




Encomende refeições e levante-as em loja


Preparar o jantar nunca foi tão fácil. Basta encomendar as suas refeições preferidas na App aplicação. Os melhores pratos de carne, peixe ou vegetarianos estão aqui. Refeições feitas como em sua casa, com os mais frescos e melhores ingredientes.
É só, ir buscá-las à sua loja Pingo Doce de eleição e desfrutar. 




Dê-nos a sua opinião e faça sugestões de melhoria


Dê-nos a sua opinião sobre a App O Meu Pingo Doce. Se tiver sugestões de melhoria ou se estiver com alguma dificuldade em utilizar a App, pedimos que nos descreva a situação através de https://www.pingodoce.pt/apoio-ao-cliente/ ou contacte-nos através do número 212 41 08 74 ou 808 20 45 45 (Chamada para a rede fixa nacional). Estamos disponíveis 24h, todos os dias, para si.

O melhor da aplicação é ter tudo à mão. Com a App Cartão Continente já pode:

- Aderir ao Cartão Continente de forma totalmente digital

- Aceder a descontos personalizados, acumular e utilizar saldo em mais de 2.000 lojas das 20 marcas associadas do Cartão Continente

- Consultar e utilizar cupões de desconto nas suas compras

- Pagar com a App Cartão Continente através do Continente Pay

- Participar em desafios e habilitar-se a ganhar prémios

- Consultar os seus movimentos e recuperar cupões que se esqueceu de usar nas suas últimas compras

- Aceder às faturas eletrónicas das suas compras nas lojas Continente

- Descobrir a localização, horário de funcionamento e contacto das lojas aderentes mais perto de si

Description. 

Get the latest trends and discover them from any location. If you love wearing fashion and using any occasion to buy clothes via the internet, download our MANGO app. Simple, easy and intuitive! 

Our most digital version features all the garments in the collection: women’s, men’s and children’s clothing. What’s more, through notifications you can discover the latest products, enjoy exclusive offers and stay up to date with the latest trends in online fashion. 

Choose your favourites with the app! Download it free and enjoy a unique experience in mobile format. 

Fashion on your mobile. 

Wherever you are, log on quickly to get your must-haves. Browse through the different collections featured, be inspired by the proposed outfits in each editorial and find what you are looking for by using the size, colour and price filters. Be inspired by all the proposals for the perfect shopping experience.  

Your online shopping bag can be accessed from any device. 

Whenever you log on to our online clothing app with your user ID and password, your items will be saved so that you can access them from any device. So, if you start filling your shopping bag from your Smartphone and later decide to continue shopping via your Tablet, the items will be synchronised, allowing you to finalise your order whenever and however you want. Enjoy your online fashion app whenever you want! 

Barcode scanner. 

You can also use the app when you are shopping in our physical stores. If you see an item you want to buy but there are none left in your size or preferred colour, you can get it via our app. Scan the barcode of the item, or enter it manually, to see where you can find one or to buy it online. Once you have placed the order, you can receive it at home or at your preferred location. 

Exclusive information

You can also use our app to stay up to date with our promotions and exclusive offers in online fashion. Enable the instant notifications feature and you’ll be among the first to discover the new collection garments arriving each week, the lookbooks to inspire your stylings of the season and the discounts and promotions you can enjoy. 

Find your nearest store. 

If you need to have the garment you want right now, use the geolocation feature of our app and find your nearest store and the quickest way to get there. 

Create your Wishlist. 

Now, your Wishlist, in a single click: include all the garments you like most in your Wishlist. Also, if you didn't manage to buy a garment in time, you can enable an availability notification. Simply enter your e-mail and you’ll receive a message as soon as it’s back in stock. 

Manage your account. 

Log on to your profile and edit your personal data whenever you like, for example the delivery address. You can also log on to the My orders section to keep all your till receipts, for both online orders and your purchases in physical stores.  You can also track all your orders and manage any returns. 

The MANGO app is much more than an online store. Shop in a simple and secure way. 

We invite you to send us your comments and suggestions on this update at the following e-mail address: online@mango.com

COMPRAR ONLINE

¡Compre todo lo que necesita a través de la app Mercado Libre! Es muy fácil buscar precios y comprar online.

¡Conozca diferentes categorías de productos! Electrodomésticos (cocina, heladera), ropa, y electrónicos (celulares, pc gamer) y accesorio para vehículos para comprar en línea utilizando la aplicación oficial que reúne millones de productos de sus marcas favoritas.

Encuentre la mayor variedad de productos para que usted pueda comparar precios y ver las opiniones de otros compradores.

En la mayor tienda online encontrará varias categorías y podrá comprar todo tipo de productos y regalos en una sola aplicación, como:
- Moda: camisetas, camisas, pantalones, vaqueros, zapatillas, ropa deportiva;
- Electrodomésticos: heladera, cocina, microondas, lavadora, aspiradora;
- Electrónicos: Pc gamer, notebook, celulares.
- Cuidado personal: perfumes, maquillaje, cremas;
- Accesorios para vehículos: neumáticos

Promociones, ofertas y precios bajos para ahorrar en su compra online. Recuerde que en tu primera compra tiene un cupón de descuento. Además de  nuestros envíos gratuitos en 24 horas* recibirá sus compras online súper rápido.

En la tienda online puede encontrar descuentos exclusivos y miles de marcas: electrónicos (celulares, notebook), electrodomésticos (heladeras y microondas), protector solar, perfumes, productos de maquillaje y belleza, moda (zapatillas, vaqueros, pantalones cortos, vestidos) ropa deportiva y neumáticos.

Ventajas de comprar online en la aplicación:

- Marque los productos que más le gusten para comprarlos en promoción. 
- Facilite sus compras en línea utilizando filtros de precio, ubicación y envío gratuito. 
- Disponemos de una variedad de productos por categorías para comparar precios: electrodomésticos, muebles (cama, colchón, sofá), moda (ropa, vaqueros, shorts, vestidos, zapatos), maquillaje, productos de belleza (protector solar, bronceadores) y muebles.
- Ahorre dinero con descuentos y cupones en las tiendas online oficiales. 
- 12 cuotas con tarjeta de débito, tarjeta de crédito, efectivo, sin tarjeta de Mercado Crédito o con el dinero disponible en la cuenta de Mercado Pago 
- Reciba su pedido sin salir de casa con envío gratuito en 24 horas. 
- Gestione sus compras online y comience a vender online.
- Compre online con ofertas exclusivas y envío gratis: electrónicos (celulares, notebook), juegos, electrodomésticos (cocina, heladera), libros, protector solar, productos de belleza, muebles (sofá, colchón), ropa deportiva, vestidos, pantalones, zapatos y sombreros.
- Aproveche los descuentos para comprar sus productos online a bajo precio, con promociones especiales.

PELÍCULAS Y SERIES GRATIS

Disfruta gratis de películas, series y contenido infantil en Mercado Play. Puedes hacerlo desde tu computadora o celular. También puedes transmitir en tu televisor a través de chromecast. Accede desde el ícono en la página principal de Mercado Libre para ver películas y series cuando quieras.

VENDER ONLINE

¡Con Mercado Libre usted puede vender más rápido!

- Haga sus anuncios gratis en 4 sencillos pasos y empiece a vender online.
- Gestione sus compras y ventas online desde su cuenta. 
- Hable con su comprador o vendedor a través de nuestra herramienta de mensajes instantáneos.

Venda electrodomésticos (heladera, microondas, cocina, lavadora), perfumes, productos de belleza, maquillaje, ropa (zapatos, vaqueros, pantalones, vestidos), deportes, electrónicos (celulares, PC gamer, notebook), accesorios para vehículos y neumáticos.

developer: Digital Trading Science & Technology (Beijing) Co. Ltd.
description:
The DHgate shopping app allows free access to the DHgate wholesale marketplace on the go – connecting you directly to wholesale sellers and getting you the best prices available.



The DHgate app provides one-stop solution for your online purchasing, from international logistics and payment, to internet finance and customer services. DHgate app features over a million Chinese wholesalers, 40 million products for sale and has amassed 10 million buyers from 230 countries and regions.



We provide the easiest and most cost effective all-in-one solution for your business. We enable anyone to buy and sell products in wholesale price globally by providing secure payment services, logistics solutions, escrow protection services, and internet financing.



With a variety of over 20 million products in categories ranging from electronics to wedding dresses and from cosmetics to furniture – you’ll never miss what you’re looking for. Simply tell the app whether you’re buying for wholesale or personal use, choose your favorite categories and receive personalized discounts and recommendations.



DHgate Shopping APP Features:

• Secure, organized and reliable mobile platform.

• Shop directly from sellers and enjoy lower-than-retail prices.

• Check daily deals to find new discount products every day.

• Make purchases individually or in bulk (for additional discounts).

• Filter and customize to find the perfect product.

• Get smart product recommendations based on preferences and browsing history.

• Read customer reviews for insight on any product.

• Pay using innovative and easy payment options.

• Ship using worldwide delivery on most products.

• Scan QR codes to jump straight to a product’s page.

• Shop at the $1.99 store for the best discounts.

• Join the VIP club to receive exclusive benefits including 24/7 customer support and more.

• Redeem seasonal promotions for coupons on all your favorite seasonal items.



Shopping Categories Include:

• Electronics

• Cellphones

• Apparel & Clothing

• Home & Garden

• Jewelry

• Fashion Accessories

• Watches

• Toys & Hobbies

• Shoes

• And much, much more!



Whether you’re an entrepreneur making a bottom line or just a savvy consumer looking for the best deals, the DHgate app offers the value you need at the prices you want.



Quick Facts for DHgate Shopping APP

• Approximately 1.2 million sellers globally

• 10 million enterprise and individual buyers from over 230 countries and regions 

• 33 million wholesale and retail product listingsA transaction every 3 seconds

• Multilingual Sales: English, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish

• Our Partners: American Express, DHL, FedEx, MasterCard, Visa, UPS



Download DHgate app and discover the best prices on clothes, electronics, shoes and more!
